sentence_zh_TW: 在這條風景如畫的小路上，行人沿著河流漫步，享受大自然的美好。
sentence: On this picturesque path, walkers stroll ______ the river, enjoying the beauty of nature.

sentence_zh_TW: 在進行任何運動時，保持手臂的靈活性和力量對於避免受傷是非常重要的。
sentence: When engaging in any sport, maintaining the flexibility and strength of your ______ is crucial to avoid injuries.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的年齡是八十歲，這將成為她人生中最重要的里程碑之一。
sentence: Her age is ______ years, which will be one of the most important milestones in her life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這座城市中，有一座著名的寺廟，吸引著各地的遊客前來參觀。
sentence: In this city, there is a famous ______ that attracts visitors from far and wide.

sentence_zh_TW: 在數學中，圓形的周長計算方法對於學生來說相當重要，尤其是在幾何學中。
sentence: In mathematics, the method for calculating the ______ circumference is quite important for students, especially in geometry.

sentence_zh_TW: 這次比賽中，我們的團隊表現得比去年更出色，這讓我們感到非常驕傲。
sentence: In this competition, our team performed better ______ last year, which made us feel very proud.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的微笑能夠照亮整個房間，讓每個人都感到快樂和放鬆。
sentence: Her ______ can light up an entire room and make everyone feel happy and relaxed.

sentence_zh_TW: 持續學習和實踐能顯著提高你的能力，讓你在職場上競爭力更強。
sentence: Continuous learning and practice can significantly improve your ______, making you more competitive in the workplace.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個繁忙的城市中，人們常常忽略身邊的小事，卻應該更多地注意生活中的美好。
sentence: In this bustling city, people often overlook the little things around them and should pay more ______ to the beauty in life.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多人都不喜歡星期一，因為它意味著週末的結束和一周工作的開始。
sentence: Many people dislike ______ because it signifies the end of the weekend and the start of a new work week.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這場比賽中，球員的表現相當優異，有助於他們的團隊贏得勝利。
sentence: In this match, the ______'s outstanding performance helped their team win the game.

sentence_zh_TW: 在一個封閉的空間中，過多的熱量積聚可能導致安全隱患，因此需要適當的通風。
sentence: In a closed space, excessive ______ buildup can pose safety risks, requiring proper ventilation.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個數學題中，答案是九，因此你需要檢查你的計算以確保準確。
sentence: In this math problem, the answer is ______, so you need to check your calculations for accuracy.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你能在這次評估中表現得很好，那麼你的成績將會很好，獲得滿意的結果。
sentence: If you do ______ in this assessment, then your grades will be great, yielding satisfactory results.

sentence_zh_TW: 擁有廣泛的知識對於在各行各業中都獲得成功是至關重要的，特別是在快節奏的全球市場中。
sentence: Having a wide range of ______ is crucial for achieving success in various fields, especially in a fast-paced global market.

sentence_zh_TW: 在學生的數學課程中，八十是十的八倍，這是重要的數字。
sentence: In the math curriculum for students, ______ is eight times ten, and it's an important number.

sentence_zh_TW: 在設計藝術作品時，重要的是考慮每個元素的形狀和佈局。
sentence: When creating a piece of art, it is important to consider the ______ and layout of each element.

sentence_zh_TW: 在現代生活中，擁有智能手機使我們的生活變得更加方便，可以隨時隨地聯繫他人。
sentence: In modern life, having a smartphone makes our lives much more ______, allowing us to connect with others anywhere and anytime.

sentence_zh_TW: 一個好的老師總是知道如何有效地引導學生，幫助他們達到學術目標。
sentence: A good teacher always knows how to effectively ______ students, helping them achieve academic goals.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個小鎮上，農夫每天都會在田地裡辛勤工作，以種植新鮮的食物供應給市場。
sentence: In this small town, the ______ works hard in the fields every day to grow fresh produce for the market.
